recordLookups.name: Get_All_Matter_Participants_for_Review
recordLookups.label: Get All Matter Participants for Review

fields.name: Contact_Display
fields.fieldText:
Participant Name: {!Loop_Selected_Matter_Participant.Name__c}

Type of Participant: {!Type_of_Participant}

Role of Participant: {!Standard_Role_of_Participant}

Participant Source: {!Loop_Selected_Matter_Participant.Source__c}

validationRule.errorMessage: Input must be 9 digits.
